UsersManagement.title: Users Management
UsersManagement.description: A dedicated space to view and manage all users in one place, making it easy to stay organized and maintain a smooth experience.

deleteUser.title: Final Confirmation
deleteUser.description: Are you sure you want to delete {fullName}?
deleteUser.warningMessage: This action is irreversible and will permanently remove the selected user. To confirm, type delete in the field below.

deleteUsers.title: Final Confirmation
deleteUsers.description: You are about to delete {count, plural, one {# user} other {# users}}.
deleteUsers.warningMessage: This action is irreversible and will permanently remove the selected {count, plural, one {user} other {users}}. To confirm, type delete in the field below.

TestsManagement.title: Tests Management
TestsManagement.adminDescription: An administrative overview to browse and remove tests as needed, helping maintain control and ensure the integrity of the testing environment.

deleteTest.title: Final Confirmation
deleteTest.description: Are you sure you want to delete the test titled {title}?
deleteTest.warningMessage: This action is irreversible and will permanently remove the selected test. To confirm, type delete in the field below.

deleteTests.title: Final Confirmation
deleteTests.description: You are about to delete {count, plural, one {# test} other {# tests}}.
deleteTests.warningMessage: This action is irreversible and will permanently remove the selected {count, plural, one {test} other {tests}}. To confirm, type delete in the field below.
